@simonjayhawkins this last one is still failing on our wheel builder (may not be this exact PR): https://travis-ci.org/MacPython/pandas-wheels/jobs/501317594

can you do a PR to fix.

```
=================================== FAILURES ===================================
_________________________ TestSafeSort.test_unsortable _________________________
[gw1] linux -- Python 3.6.6 /venv/bin/python
self = <pandas.tests.test_sorting.TestSafeSort object at 0x7f245d73c278>
    @pytest.mark.skipif(PY2, reason="pytest.raises match regex fails")
    def test_unsortable(self):
        # GH 13714
        arr = np.array([1, 2, datetime.now(), 0, 3], dtype=object)
        msg = (r"'(<|>)' not supported between instances of"
               r" 'datetime\.datetime' and 'int'|"
               r"unorderable types: int\(\) > datetime\.datetime\(\)")
        if compat.PY2:
            # RuntimeWarning: tp_compare didn't return -1 or -2 for exception
            with warnings.catch_warnings():
                with pytest.raises(TypeError, match=msg):
                    safe_sort(arr)
        else:
            with pytest.raises(TypeError, match=msg):
>               safe_sort(arr)
E               AssertionError: Pattern ''(<|>)' not supported between instances of 'datetime\.datetime' and 'int'|unorderable types: int\(\) > datetime\.datetime\(\)' not found in ''>' not supported between instances of 'int' and 'datetime.datetime''
/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pandas/tests/test_sorting.py:422: AssertionError
=============================== warnings summary ===============================
/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/_pytest/assertion/rewrite.py:268: PytestWarning: Module already imp
```
